title: PowerGridIQ – Energy Demand Forecast Dashboard
goal: Forecast city-level electricity demand using weather and usage data.
why_it_matters: Predicting demand helps reduce blackouts and optimize energy distribution.
data: Hourly consumption data (UCI Electricity dataset), temperature, humidity.
ai: Correlation analysis between temperature and load.
workflow: Display peak-hour alerts and usage summaries.
outcome: High-impact predictive analytics; shows practical modeling and dashboard design.
